name: Google Font Pairing V2.0 (2022)
description:
Everyone loves free fonts. And Google Fonts has some of best free fonts by world class designers. But some designers still find it very difficult to pair fonts.


So I went ahead, did all the effort and research and compiled this collection of 20+ Google Font Pairings for you. You can pick whichever you like and start working üòÉ
